#summary HToolTip widget information

= Introduction =

A nice baloon tooltip window for GTK.

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/fr.daniil/SDayVaJcrpI/AAAAAAAAACo/0Ec8bJ6thso/h-gtk-baloon-tooltip.jpg]


= Details =

Use it like this:
{{{
   //optional line - you can set from here the tooltip appear interval
   HollyLibrary.HToolTip.ToolTipInterval = 1500; 
   //assign tooltips to some buttons
   HollyLibrary.HToolTip.AddToolTip( button1, "My title", "My tooltip text" );
   HollyLibrary.HToolTip.AddToolTip( button2, "My title", "buga buga"       );
}}}
